    • Uses of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry

      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry with type parameters of type Provider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRegistry<E extends Identifiable<K>,K,P extends Provider<E>>
      The AbstractRegistry is an abstract implementation of the Registry interface, that can be used as base class for Registry implementations.
      Subinterfaces of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ManagedProvider<E extends Identifiable<K>,K>
      The ManagedProvider is a specific Provider that enables to add, remove and update elements at runtime.
      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry that implement Provider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractManagedProvider<E extends Identifiable<K>,K,PE>
      AbstractManagedProvider is an abstract implementation for the ManagedProvider interface and can be used as base class for ManagedProvider implementations.
      class  AbstractProvider<E>
      AbstractProvider can be used as base class for Provider implementations.
      class  DefaultAbstractManagedProvider<E extends Identifiable<K>,K>
      DefaultAbstractManagedProvider is a specific AbstractManagedProvider implementation, where the stored element is the same as the element of the provider.
      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry that return Provider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @Nullable Provider<E> AbstractRegistry.getProvider(E element)
      This method retrieves the provider of an element from the registry.
      protected @Nullable Provider<E> AbstractRegistry.getProvider(K key)
      This method retrieves the provider of an element from the registry.
      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry with parameters of type Provider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ProviderChangeListener.added(Provider<E> provider, E element)
      Notifies the listener that a single element has been added.
      void AbstractRegistry.added(Provider<E> provider, E element) 
      protected void AbstractRegistry.addProvider(Provider<E> provider) 
      protected void AbstractRegistry.forEach(Provider<E> provider, Consumer<E> consumer)
      This method traverses over all elements of a provider in the registry and calls the consumer with each element.
      void ProviderChangeListener.removed(Provider<E> provider, E element)
      Notifies the listener that a single element has been removed.
      void AbstractRegistry.removed(Provider<E> provider, E element) 
      protected void AbstractRegistry.removeProvider(Provider<E> provider) 
      void ProviderChangeListener.updated(Provider<E> provider, E oldelement, E element)
      Notifies the listener that a single element has been updated.
      void AbstractRegistry.updated(Provider<E> provider, E oldElement, E element) 
      Method parameters in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry with type arguments of type Provider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void AbstractRegistry.forEach(BiConsumer<Provider<E>,E> consumer)
      This method traverses over all elements in the registry and calls the consumer with the provider of the element as the first parameter and the element as the second argument.

    • Uses of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items

      Subinterfaces of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ItemProvider
      An item provider provides instances of GenericItem.
      interface  ManagedMetadataProvider
      ManagedMetadataProvider is an OSGi service interface that allows to add or remove metadata for items at runtime.
      interface  MetadataProvider
      This is a marker interface for metadata provider implementations that should be used to register those as an OSGi service.
      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items that implement Provider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedItemProvider
      ManagedItemProvider is an OSGi service, that allows to add or remove items at runtime by calling ManagedItemProvider#addItem(Item) or ManagedItemProvider#removeItem(Item) .

    • Uses of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing

      Subinterfaces of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ThingProvider
      The ThingProvider is responsible for providing things.
      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing that implement Provider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedThingProvider
      ManagedThingProvider is an OSGi service, that allows to add or remove things at runtime by calling ManagedThingProvider#addThing(Thing) or ManagedThingProvider#removeThing(Thing).

    • Uses of Provider in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.link

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLinkRegistry<L extends AbstractLink,P extends Provider<L>>
      AbstractLinkRegistry is an abstract class for link based registries, which handle AbstractLinks.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      The ItemChannelLinkProvider is responsible for providing item channel links.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedItemChannelLinkProvider
      ManagedItemChannelLinkProvider is responsible for managed ItemChannelLinks at runtime.
